1.title: Defying the Nazis
1.plot: We all know of American bombers devastating Nazi Germany and think the U.S. started fighting the Nazi's after the Pearl Harbor attacks...We've all seen Nazi propaganda as well as the Nazi film Triumph of the Will... but what you don't know are the stories behind some of the biggest deceptions, the top secrets and the secret weapons used to help defy the Nazis in WWII. Host Joe Moniaci reveals What History Forgot!

2.title: Making America
2.plot: We all know of George Washington, the California Gold Rush, the vast highways that stretch across America, and the wars between the United States and Great Britain...But what about the stories you don't know- the secrets behind the making of America?... Host Joe Moniaci reveals What History Forgot!

3.title: Fighting for Freedom
3.plot: We've all heard the phrase "Go for Broke!", remember the Fall of Saigon as Vietnam's bitter end, have listened to the legends spun around top-secret microfilm, and have seen the classic movie, "the Dirty Dozen", But what you haven't heard are the incredible accounts of the Patriotic warriors, selfless heroes, and legendary combat paratroopers who risked their lives to fight for our freedom...Host Joe Moniaci remembers What History Forgot.

4.title: Secrets and Scandals
4.plot: We all know Madison Square Garden as the world's most famous arena, are well aware of the crime and corruption that surrounded Prohibition Bootlegging, are captivated by the mere mention of a spy amongst us, and can't resist the sensational appeal of a presidential scandal... But what about Uncle Sam's fatal plans, murderous love triangles, super size spies, and a baby's blue eyes? Host Joe Moniaci exposes the secrets and scandals on What History Forgot.

5.title: Breaking the Rules
5.plot: We all know the significance of the Civil War, the CIA, the Civil Rights movement, and the advent of flight...but what about the rules that were broken in order to forge the American spirit we know today? Host Joe Moniaci reveals What History Forgot!

6.title: Top Secret WWII
6.plot: We've all heard about the ultra covert units used in WWII, the unbreakable codes, top secret underground nerve centers, and super-human navy seals, but what about WWII's most classified operations? Host Joe Moniaci divulges What History Forgot!

1.title: Icons of Freedom
1.plot: We all know the Star Spangled Banner, have seen the Statue of Liberty, have played Monopoly and know who Amelia Earhart is...but what are the secrets you don't know behind some of America's biggest icons?

2.title: Crooks
2.plot: We all know of the 9/11 terrorist attack on NYC, the Boy Scouts and Coca-Cola and have heard the name DB Cooper...but what are the secrets behind some of America's biggest crooks, schemes, and scandals?

3.title: To the Ends of the World
3.plot: We all know about the attack on Pearl Harbor, the Hindenburg disaster, Apollo 13 and the race to the Moon, but what are the unknown stories behind some of the biggest disasters, threats and conquests in America's skies?

4.title: Secret Weapons
4.plot: We know what The Cold War, the Vietnam War and WWII were...but what are the unknown stories of some of the incredible plots, ploys and people behind America's secret weapons during these wars?

5.title: Verge of Destruction
5.plot: Did you know that Rosa Parks wasn't the first African American woman to refuse to give up her seat... that the Berlin Airlift included candy for kids...or that one of the great rifles used in war was invented by a man who made Moonshine?

6.title: Rebels with a Cause
6.plot: Did you know that Rosa Parks wasn't the first African American woman to refuse to give up her seat... that the Berlin Airlift included candy for kids... or that one of the great rifles used in war was invented by a man who made Moonshine? Host and history buff Joe Moniaci uncovers What History Forgot.

imdb.plot outline: We all know that the United States was the first nation to put a man on the moon, but did you know that the Soviets were there too? What about the true origins behind our beloved Star Spangled Banner (hint: it may or may not have been a drinking song!), or the secret ingredient in the original Coca-Cola recipe? For every great story that people remember, there are hundreds of others that remain untold. Now, these fascinating and surprising stories come alive in American Heroes Channel's (AHC) new, six-part series, WHAT HISTORY FORGOT. Hosted by history buff and veteran high school teacher Joe Moniaci, WHAT HISTORY FORGOT tells famously forgotten tales that shaped some of America's greatest icons, scandals and disasters.
